Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Factor \Fac"tor\, v. t. [imp. & p. p. {Factored} (-t[e^]rd); p. pr. & vb. n. {Factoring}.] (Mach.) To resolve (a quantity) into its factors. [1913 Webster]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Factoring \Fac"tor*ing\, n. (Math.) The act of resolving into factors. [1913 Webster]
factoring n : (mathematics) the resolution of an integer or polynomial into factors such that when multiplied together they give the integer or polynomial [syn: {factorization}, {factorisation}]
